fossils.name: Trilobite
fossils.description: Extinct marine arthropods that form one of the earliest known groups of arthropods.

fossils.name: Ammonite
fossils.description: An extinct group of marine mollusc animals in the subclass Ammonoidea of the class Cephalopoda.

fossils.name: Tyrannosaurus Rex
fossils.description: A species of coelurosaurian theropod dinosaur that lived throughout what is now western North America.

fossils.name: Velociraptor
fossils.description: A genus of dromaeosaurid theropod dinosaur that lived approximately 75 to 71 million years ago.

fossils.name: Stegosaurus
fossils.description: A genus of herbivorous thyreophoran dinosaur known for its distinctive tail spikes and plates.
